Title: Our Mother's House
Writer: Jeremy Brooks (screenplay by), Haya Harareet (screenplay by), Julian Gloag (based on the novel by)
Actors: Dirk Bogarde, Margaret Leclere, Pamela Franklin, Louis Sheldon Williams
Plot: When their deeply religious mother dies, the seven Hook children bury her in the garden and continue life as normal. Then their absent father, Charlie, reappears...
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 nomination.
